title: Scott Bessent, Trump’s Billionaire Treasury Pick, Will Shed Assets to Avoid Conflicts

title: Bitcoin soared in 2024. How much — if any — should you own?
description: The crypto asset was the top performer in 2024, rising about 125%. But finance pros say bitcoin should generally not account for over 5% of your portfolio.

title: Will Bitcoin Stay Below 100K? Bulls Battle Bears For BTC Price Dominance as JetBolt Rockets
description: The crypto market is at a crossroads as Bitcoin’s price faces intense pressure from both bullish and bearish forces. Trading at $94,082.29, Bitcoin has seen a 2.5% daily decline, raising questions about its trajectory. With key support levels under scrutiny and potential volatility on the horizon, BTC’s journey to reclaim six-figure territory seems uncertain as […]
